rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, Meleph, have you known
Zeke for a long time?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0002
rows.name:
Indeed. We'd never spoken directly,
but I knew of him.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0003
rows.name:
The Prince paid a visit to Superbia,
did he not? It must have been not long
after his departure from Luxuria.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0004
rows.name: Yes, now that you mention it...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0005
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0006
rows.name: How was he, back then?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0007
rows.name: You weren't really interested, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0101
rows.name: Well, let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0102
rows.name:
As I recall, the guards reported
capturing a suspicious man, dressed
all in black and with a funny accent.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0103
rows.name:
That's right.
They'd stopped him at the palace gates
and were about to throw him in jail.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0104
rows.name:
He was already a shady customer
back then, huh...?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0105
rows.name:
It's a good thing the Prince was feeling
generous, otherwise it could have been
a major diplomatic incident.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0106
rows.name:
Most certainly. Thanks be to his
forbearance.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0107
rows.name:
That's just like Zeke, though.
I can almost picture it now...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0109
rows.name:
Teeheehee... That isn't even the worst
of my Prince's heroic tales!

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0110
rows.name: There are worse ones yet?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0111
rows.name:
Oh yeah, loads!
He's pretty much misfortune on legs.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0112
rows.name:
Like, when he visited Invidia, they
mistook him for a rookie guard and
made us drill for 72 hours straight.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0113
rows.name:
My Prince was happy as a clam,
said it was a rare chance to see
other countries' training regimens...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0114
rows.name:
If you ask me though, it was
beyond awful.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0115
rows.name:
The grub was worse than Armu kibble,
and they didn't even have baths...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0116
rows.name: Calamity indeed.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0117
rows.name:
Yet despite that treatment, he let it
pass without creating an uproar...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0118
rows.name: Quite the gracious personage, our Zeke.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0119
rows.name:
Gracious? I think he was just doing
whatever he felt like...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0120
rows.name:
I think you're being a bit
too harsh on him there...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0121
rows.name:
Honestly, I'm impressed by
how he never seems to be
fazed by any situation!

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0122
rows.name:
If he heard you say that,
I'm pretty sure he'd start bawlin'...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0201
rows.name: No, I was curious...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0202
rows.name:
I had heard him praised as the
greatest Driver in Luxuria, after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0203
rows.name:
I would have liked to spar with him, but
at the end of the day I had my duties...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0204
rows.name:
I was curious about him myself...
Truly, a shame.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0205
rows.name:
And now?
You don't wanna spar anymore?

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0206
rows.name: No...there is no need.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0207
rows.name: Now I can see him in action at my side.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0208
rows.name: And he is as reliable as they come.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0209
rows.name: Quite...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0210
rows.name:
His personality may be somewhat
unique, but his prowess cannot
be questioned.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0211
rows.name:
Still, that's a shame...
I would have liked to see
the two of you go at it!

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0213
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0214
rows.name:
Well, if the opportunity arises,
I would not mind facing him.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0215
rows.name:
Rivalry can benefit both parties.
And it can only be helpful to grasp
one's allies' strengths and weaknesses.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0216
rows.name:
Rex, a word of advice...
Try not to egg Meleph-sama on.
She tends to take people very seriously.

rows.label: kizunatalk045_msg0217
rows.name: My bad...
